mapper.select: select * from INSBOrderlistenpush where taskid = #{value} order by createtime desc limit 1
select * from INSBOrderlistenpush where subtaskid = #{value} order by createtime desc limit 1

update INSBOrderlistenpush set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},platformtype = #{platformtype},operationtype = #{operationtype},taskid = #{taskid},taskcode = #{taskcode},status = #{status},message = #{message},lzgid = #{lzgid},subtaskid=#{subtaskid},taskname=#{taskname} where id = #{id}
select * FROM insborderlistenpush WHERE operationtype in(1,3,4) AND status = #{type}
